title: Otoko no Ko wa Maid Fuku ga Osuki!?
original_name: オトコのコはメイド服がお好き！？
sinopse:
The rumored cafe in town “Cherry Girls” 4 maids work there, but they are actually the owner’s “sons” There’s no way such cute girls could be guys, you say? No wait, there’s no way such cute girls could even exist!

(Source: Yuuwakuwaku)
